channel.title: Need help with the hosting
channel.description:
Hi guys i am a little bit new here i read the forums but i couldn't understand the tutorial how to make a server to stop questions. i have done it step by step bit it doesnt works and that tutorials need to be updates cause there is a jdk6 update 4 now. But my real question was i cant register at the moparscape serverstatus i run the server.bat file but i dont know how to use that no-ip progam could someone help me please it is confusing me
Thanks for reading please don't answer if you are laughing at me

item.title: Need help with the hosting
item.dc:creator: @Silenced Silenced
item.description:
@Silenced wrote:

Have you followed all the steps?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 28, 2008, 04:54:46 AM[/size][hr][quote=“hkayak, post:1, topic:184888”]Hi guys i am a little bit new here i read the forums but i couldn’t understand the tutorial how to make a server to stop questions.
i have done it step by step bit it doesnt works and that tutorials need to be updates cause there is a jdk6 update 4 now.[/quote]
the same with me
i couldnt get a server up with that
and i dont think it matters on what jdk version u got (correct me if im wrong)

anyway
i made my first server with this tutorial
http://www.moparisthebest.com:64/smf/index.php/topic,243761.0.html

it worked for me
(reply with what u r stuck on)

******** BTW www.runelocus.com/index.php?action=statuscheck to check if your server is online or not.

Read full topic
